#summary Regroupement des atomes en mots du dictionnaire.

*Voir aussi :* InstallationDeMacaon, MacaCommon, MacaLex
 
=maca_lexer=

Regroupe les atomes en mots du lexique du lefff.

|| *Responsable* ||AlexisNasr||
|| *Langage* ||C||
|| *Dernière version* ||0.3||
|| *Date* ||2006/11/20||
|| *URL* ||[http://www.lif-sud.univ-mrs.fr/~nasr/macaon/maca_lexer-0.3.tar.gz maca_lexer-0.3]||

=== Dépendances ===
 * Librairies Macaon
   * MacaCommon
   * MacaLex 
 * Librairies et programmes externes
   * [http://xmlsoft.org/ libxml2]

=== Commande ===
{{{
usage: maca_lexer [options]
OPTIONS :
      -h            : print this message
      -V            : show version
      -i <file>     : xml input file
      -o <file>     : xml output file (default is stdout)
      -v            : verbose mode
}}} 

== Entrée ==

{{{
<!ELEMENT sentence (tokens) >

<!ELEMENT tokens (token|ne)+ >
<!ATTLIST tokens >

<!ELEMENT token (#PCDATA) >
<!ATTLIST token
          type CDATA #IMPLIED
          id ID #REQUIRED >

<!ELEMENT ne (token+) >
<!ATTLIST pos CDATA #IMPLIED
          type CDATA #REQUIRED >
}}}

== Sortie ==

{{{
<!ELEMENT sentence (tokens,words) >

<!ELEMENT tokens (token|ne)+ >

<!ELEMENT token (#PCDATA) >
<!ATTLIST token
          type CDATA #IMPLIED
          id ID #REQUIRED >

<!ELEMENT ne (token+) >
<!ATTLIST pos CDATA #IMPLIED
          type CDATA #REQUIRED >

<!ELEMENT words (word+) >
<!ATTLIST words
          count CDATA #IMPLIED >

<!ELEMENT word (form) >
<!ATTLIST word
          id ID #REQUIRED
          tokens IDREFS #REQUIRED
          type CDATA #IMPLIED >

<!ELEMENT form (#PCDATA) >
}}}
